title.english: The Vampire Dies in No Time Season 2

description: The second season of Kyuuketsuki Sugu Shinu.
synonyms: เจ้าแวมไพร์ พันธุ์ตายไว 2

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiroshikoujina)

The representative director of Studio Live.

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

**[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kat.njima)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kat_njima)**

**Katsuhiro Nakajima** is a Japanese sound effects creator/editor working for [Swara Production](https://anidb.net/creator/3214).

__Height:__ 173 cm
__Skills & Abilities:__ Kendo

[Profile (Pony Canyon)](https://www.ponycanyon.co.jp/artist/31356600) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/black_fukuyama)

Fukuyama released his debut music album "Romantic World 31" on his birthday (November 26) in 2009, his second album "Love Letters 2: Paris Romantic" on July 21, 2010, his third album "Fukuyama Jun, Ai wo Utau!" on May 25, 2011, and his fourth album "Love Letter 3 ~Matsuri no Kuni de~" on May 22, 2013. He also appeared in a 2009 romantic comedy movie Fujoshi Kanojo in a cameo role.

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Joker](https://anilist.co/character/121590/Ren-Amamiya) - Persona 5
- Renya Goutou - 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim
- [Camu](https://anilist.co/character/278324/Camu) - Punishing: Gray Raven
- [Kamui](https://anilist.co/character/259960) - Punishing: Gray Raven
- Vyn Richter - Tears of Themis
- Martin - Rune Factory 5
- Hugo - Zenless Zone Zero
- Logos - Arknights

__Genres:__ House, drum and bass, bvn jungle, chiptune

[Website](https://fareastrecording.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fareastrecordin/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/soichiteradamusic/)

__Souichi Terada__ is a Japanese electronic music composer, best known for his work in the Ape Escape video game series. In 1990, he and Shinichiro Yokota formed the label Far East Recording, releasing various albums and singles.
As Omodaka, he produces songs that mix traditional Japanese music with chiptune. During Omodaka's live performances, he dresses like a Miko while wearing a white mask, and makes use of electronic devices such as monitors, portable videogame consoles and a Korg Kaossilator.
Is the leader for the band [fhána](https://anilist.co/staff/118915/fhana) as well as keyboardist and vocalist.
Is the leader for the band [fhána](https://anilist.co/staff/118915/fhana) as well as keyboardist and vocalist.

__[Website](https://akihata.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akihata_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akihata.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AKIHATAjp)__

__Aki Hata__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).

__[Website](https://www.peakasoul.net/kurosu) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/krossy)__

__Katsuhiko Kurosu__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926).
